name: Killer
text: On Play: Look at the top 5 cards of your deck, reveal up to 1 [Kid Pirates] type card other than [Killer] and add it to your hand. Return the rest to the bottom of your deck in any order.

effect.text: Look at the top 5 cards of your deck, reveal up to 1 [Kid Pirates] type card other than [Killer] and add it to your hand. Return the rest to the bottom of your deck in any order.
